WaterML 1.1 REST Service Request Examples

Issue WaterML 1.1 sample requests for data and metadata from the {{ p }} data network using the service links below. XML responses will be returned, generated by the WOFpy server software.

Sites

  • GetSites
  • GetSites?site={{p}}:{{s}}
  • GetSitesByBox?west={{w}}&south={{ so }}&east={{ e }}&north={{ n }}&IncludeSeries=false
  • GetSiteInfo?site={{p}}:{{s}}
  • GetSiteInfoMultple?site={{p}}:{{s}}

Variables

  • GetVariables
  • GetVariableInfo
  • GetVariableInfo?variable={{p}}:{{v}}

Values

  • GetValues?location={{p}}:{{s}}&variable={{p}}:{{v}} Note: May crash browser for large values sets.
  • GetValues?location={{p}}:{{s}}&variable={{p}}:{{v}}&startDate={{sd}}&endDate={{ed}}
  • GetValuesForASite?site={{p}}:{{s}}&startDate={{sd}}&endDate={{ed}}
